characters.name: Tracer
characters.description: An agile and time-bending adventurer, Tracer darts around the battlefield, causing chaos with her quick-fire pistols and temporal abilities.

characters.name: Winston
characters.description: A brilliant scientist and genetically engineered gorilla, Winston uses his advanced technology and primal strength to protect the world as a noble hero.

characters.name: Mercy
characters.description: A skilled healer with a heart of compassion, Mercy uses her Caduceus Staff to revive and heal allies, ensuring they stay in the fight.

characters.name: Reinhardt
characters.description: A valiant, knightly warrior clad in powered armor, Reinhardt wields a massive hammer and defends his team with an energy shield.

characters.name: Widowmaker
characters.description: A lethal assassin with pinpoint precision, Widowmaker stalks her enemies from afar, taking them down with deadly sniper shots.

characters.name: Genji
characters.description: A cybernetic ninja with mastery over both blade and stealth, Genji blends agility with powerful sword strikes to defeat his foes.

characters.name: D.Va
characters.description: A former pro-gamer turned mech pilot, D.Va uses her powerful exosuit to protect her team with heavy firepower and a defensive matrix.

characters.name: Bastion
characters.description: A reconfigured combat robot, Bastion shifts between mobile assault and stationary defense modes, unleashing devastating firepower.

characters.name: Zenyatta
characters.description: A peace-seeking omnic monk, Zenyatta brings harmony and tranquility to the battlefield while unleashing destructive energy orbs.

characters.name: Ana
characters.description: A veteran sniper and battle-hardened healer, Ana supports her team from a distance, using her biotic rifle to both heal allies and damage foes.
